title: DT Swiss Adds Dynamo-Equipped Gravel Wheels for The Coming Darkness
content:
DT SWISS launch a Dynamo Hub, packed with Shutter Precision internals; available aftermarket, or as part of two new gravel wheels

Read the full article at DT Swiss Adds Dynamo-Equipped Gravel Wheels for The Coming Darkness on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
